to be consistent with the code and the description.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -203,6 +203,15 @@
       will use for writing chunks (60 by default).
     </description>
   </property>
+  <property>
+    <name>dfs.container.ratis.num.write.chunk.executor.queue.limit</name>
+    <value>60</value>

nodes.bodyText: num stands for "number of ..." (eg. in dfs.container.ratis.num.write.chunk.threads it is "number of ... threads").  It seems to be unnecessary in this property name, "... queue limit" seems better than "number of ... queue limit".
